Comment: I don't claim to know whether or not the accusations are true...but I know one thing: true or not, Ellison's status as a 'double-minority' (African-American & Muslim) will ensure a cacophony of protests from the usual suspects (liberals) calling these accusations "racist", "bigoted" and "Islamophobic".
Author: Vessarionovich

Comment: What is it the left likes to say, nobody is above the law.
Author: dottedoctet
